CustomField.description: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c)), (Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c) / 100, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Fixed_Premi_Amount__c)), (Fixed_Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c) / 100, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Premi_Amount__c)), (Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c) / 100, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c)), Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c <> 0 ), Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Fixed_Premi_Amount__c)), Fixed_Premi_Amount__c <> 0 ), Fixed_Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c, IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Premi_Amount__c)), Premi_Amount__c <> 0 ), Premi_Amount__c * Commision__c, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Commision Amount
